pkgmetadata.longdescription: Geometric Morphometrics Analyses // Tools for geometric morphometric analysis. The package includes tools of virtual anthropology to align two not articulated parts belonging to the same specimen, to build virtual cavities as endocast (Profico et al, 2017 doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.32524.00640), and functions to import and export the coordinates of landmarks and 3D paths into 'landmarkAscii' and 'am' format files.
